sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnrecomendsiteinfo ( RECOMEND_SITE_ID , recomend_site_nm , recomend_site_url , recomend_site_dc , recomend_resn_cn , recomend_confm_at , confm_de , frst_regist_pnttm , frst_register_id , last_updt_pnttm , last_updusr_id ) VALUES ( #recomendSiteId# , #recomendSiteNm# , #recomendSiteUrl# , #recomendSiteDc# , #recomendResnCn# , #recomendConfmAt# , #confmDe# , #frstRegistPnttm# , #frstRegisterId# , #lastUpdtPnttm# , #lastUpdusrId# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnrecomendsiteinfo SET recomend_site_id = #recomendSiteId# , recomend_site_nm = #recomendSiteNm# , recomend_site_url = #recomendSiteUrl# , recomend_site_dc = #recomendSiteDc# , recomend_resn_cn = #recomendResnCn# , recomend_confm_at = #recomendConfmAt# , confm_de = #confmDe# , frst_regist_pnttm = #frstRegistPnttm# , frst_register_id = #frstRegisterId# , last_updt_pnttm = #lastUpdtPnttm# , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# WHERE recomend_site_id = #recomendSiteId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT recomend_site_id , recomend_site_nm , recomend_site_url , recomend_site_dc , recomend_resn_cn , recomend_confm_at , confm_de , frst_regist_pnttm , frst_register_id , last_updt_pnttm , last_updusr_id FROM comtnrecomendsiteinfo WHERE recomend_site_id = #recomendSiteId#

SELECT recomend_site_id , recomend_site_nm , recomend_site_url , recomend_site_dc , recomend_resn_cn , recomend_confm_at , confm_de , frst_regist_pnttm , frst_register_id , last_updt_pnttm , last_updusr_id FROM comtnrecomendsiteinfo WHERE 1=1
recomend_site_id = #searchKeyword#
recomend_site_nm LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
ORDER BY recomend_site_id DESC limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnrecomendsiteinfo WHERE 1=1
recomend_site_id = #searchKeyword#
recomend_site_nm LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
